classes.name: HolographicNegativeSpaceEncoder
classes.docstring:
Encodes negative space signatures using holographic principles.

The holographic principle suggests that the information within a volume
can be encoded on its boundary. This class extends this concept to
negative spaces, encoding their fractal properties in a holographic
manner that distributes information across the entire signature.

methods.name: __init__
methods.docstring:
Initialize the holographic encoder.

Args:
    encoding_dims: Dimensionality of the holographic encoding
    redundancy_factor: Information redundancy factor (resilience)
    use_phase_encoding: Whether to use phase for encoding (more secure)
    quantum_resistant: Use quantum-resistant algorithms

methods.name: encode
methods.docstring:
Encode negative space coordinates holographically.

Args:
    coordinates: Array of 3D coordinates
    
Returns:
    Dictionary containing encoded holographic representation:
        - holographic_signature: The holographic encoding
        - entropy_measure: Information density measure
        - verification_key: Key for verifying the encoding
        - fractal_fingerprint: Original fractal fingerprint

methods.name: verify
methods.docstring:
Verify if coordinates match the holographic signature.

Args:
    holographic_data: Previously encoded holographic data
    coordinates: Coordinates to verify
    
Returns:
    True if verification successful, False otherwise
